Lightning Strikes Twice.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
Lightning Strikes Twice.flavor: Living lightning wraps your body, letting you surge from one target to the next.
Lightning Strikes Twice.effect: You teleport 5 squares and make a secondary attack.
Lightning Strikes Twice.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Lightning Strikes Twice.secondaryeffect: You teleport 5 squares and make a secondary attack as above, then teleport 5 squares and make the secondary attack again against a different creature.

Aspect of the Infinite Storm.name: Aspect of the Infinite Storm
Aspect of the Infinite Storm.flavor: When you strike, you summon the transformative power of the infinite storm.
Aspect of the Infinite Storm.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Aspect of the Infinite Storm.onHit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier lightning damage, and ongoing 10 lightning damage (save ends).
Aspect of the Infinite Storm.effect: After the attack, you become the tempestuous storm, occupying a 7-square by 7-square area centered on your space. While in this form, you are insubstantial, you can occupy other creaturesâ€™ spaces, and you cannot attack. When any creature starts its turn in your new space, you slide that creature 2 squares. In addition, one creature hit by the at-will attack takes 5 extra lightning damage and is dazed until the end of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, you return to your normal form in any unoccupied space in the area of the tempestuous storm.

Stormwalker.name: Stormwalker
Stormwalker.flavor: The winds of the immortal storm carry you into battle.
Stormwalker.effect: You gain a fly speed equal to your speed and can hover. This effect lasts until an attack hits you or until the end of the encounter. When the effect ends, you descend to the ground without taking falling damage.
